articles.author: MARI YAMAGUCHI Associated Press
articles.title: An American bomb from WWII explodes at a Japanese airport, leaving a crater on the taxiway - ABC News
articles.description: A U.S. bomb from World War II has exploded at a Japanese airport, causing a large crater in a taxiway and the cancellation of more than 80 flights
articles.content: TOKYO -- An unexploded U.S. bomb from World War II that had been buried at a Japanese airport exploded Wednesday, causing a large crater in a taxiway and the cancellation of more than 80 flights, Jap… [+1313 chars]

articles.author: Will Laws
articles.title: Houston Finally Has a Problem: Hinch, Youthful Tigers Snap Astros’ ALCS Streak - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Houston’s seven-year streak of reaching the American League Championship Series is over after former Astros manager A.J. Hinch guided Detroit to an era-ending upset in the wild-card round.
articles.content:
All dynasties are eventually dethroned. We may have witnessed the end of baseballs only true modern dynasty on Wednesday.
